pages.text: Tier two wit aspect scepter. Adds the modifiers $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/witty)Witty$() and $(l:amethyst_imbuement:modifiers/lesser_attuned)Lesser Attuned$() and the unique spell $(l:amethyst_imbuement:spell_book/persuade)Persuade$(). Can be augmented with tier two or lower spells. Second tier of progression on the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_paths/path_of_resonance)Path of Resonance.$()$(br2)$(l)Mana:$() 550
